NewsArticle.Title: Divine Love Ring and Love Bouquet
NewsArticle.Content:
Give your special Dark Ages friend a Divine Love Ring and Love Bouquet! The ring is now available for a limited time at the Fae Princess. To learn more about the bouquet( a permanent feature), go see Alane.
Happy Valentines!!
Coming Soon: The Medenia region of Alsaids and the town of Hwarone. New quests, items, NPCs, and hunting areas.
